mapper.insert: INSERT INTO emp_base( id, emp_name, social_no, dept_cd, team_cd, position_cd, email, hire_date, emp_phone, address, reg_dtime, mod_dtime, reg_id, mod_id ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{empName}, #{socialNo}, #{deptCd}, #{teamCd}, #{positionCd}, #{email}, #{hireDate}, #{empPhone}, #{address}, NOW(), NOW(), #{regId}, #{modId} )
mapper.select: select id, emp_name empName, social_no socialNo, dept_cd deptCd, team_cd teamCd, position_cd positionCd, email, hire_date hireDate, retire_date retireDate, emp_status empStatus, emp_phone empPhone, dayoff_cnt dayoffCnt, address, reg_dtime regDtime, mod_dtime modDtime, reg_id regId, mod_id modId FROM emp_base

select id, emp_name empName, social_no socialNo, dept_cd deptCd, team_cd teamCd, position_cd positionCd, email, hire_date hireDate, retire_date retireDate, emp_status empStatus, emp_phone empPhone, dayoff_cnt dayoffCnt, address, reg_dtime regDtime, mod_dtime modDtime, reg_id regId, mod_id modId FROM emp_base WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE emp_base SET emp_name = #{empName}, dept_cd = #{deptCd}, team_cd = #{teamCd}, position_cd = #{positionCd}, email = #{email}, emp_status = #{empStatus}, emp_phone = #{empPhone}, retire_date = #{retireDate}, address = #{address}, mod_dtime = NOW(), mod_id = #{modId} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) AS hireMonthCnt FROM emp_base WHERE (MONTH(hire_date) = ${month}) AND (YEAR(hire_date) = ${year})
SELECT COUNT(*) AS retireMonthCnt FROM emp_base WHERE (MONTH(retire_date) = ${month}) AND (YEAR(hire_date) = ${year})
SELECT COUNT(*) AS hireYearCnt FROM emp_base WHERE (YEAR(hire_date) = ${year})
SELECT COUNT(*) AS retireYearCnt FROM emp_base WHERE (YEAR(retire_date) = ${year})

SELECT p.position_cd AS positionCd, s.cd_nm AS positionName, COUNT(p.position_cd) AS positionCnt FROM st_std_cd s LEFT JOIN emp_base p ON p.position_cd = s.cd AND p.emp_status = '재직자' WHERE s.grp_cd = 'P001' AND s.use_yn = 'y' GROUP BY s.cd, s.cd_nm;

SELECT p.dept_cd AS deptCd, s.cd_nm AS deptName, COUNT(p.dept_cd) AS deptCnt FROM st_std_cd s LEFT JOIN emp_base p ON p.dept_cd = s.cd WHERE s.grp_cd = 'D001' AND s.use_yn = 'y' AND p.emp_status = '재직자' GROUP BY s.cd, s.cd_nm;

SELECT s.cd AS teamCd, s.cd_nm AS teamName, COUNT(p.team_cd) AS teamCnt FROM st_std_cd s LEFT JOIN emp_base p ON p.team_cd = s.cd AND p.emp_status = '재직자' WHERE s.grp_cd = 'T001' AND s.use_yn = 'y' GROUP BY s.cd, s.cd_nm;

SELECT SUM(CASE WHEN SUBSTRING(social_no, 8, 1) IN ('1', '3') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS maleCount, SUM(CASE WHEN SUBSTRING(social_no, 8, 1) IN ('2', '4') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS femaleCount FROM emp_base WHERE emp_status = '재직자'

SELECT id, emp_name empName, social_no socialNo, dept_cd deptCd, team_cd teamCd, position_cd positionCd, email, hire_date hireDate, retire_date retireDate, emp_status empStatus, emp_phone empPhone, dayoff_cnt dayoffCnt, address, reg_dtime regDtime, mod_dtime modDtime, reg_id regId, mod_id modId FROM emp_base
1=1
AND emp_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchWord}, '%')
ORDER BY reg_dtime DESC

SELECT E.id id, E.emp_name empName, E.social_no socialNo, E.dept_cd deptCd, E.team_cd teamCd, E.position_cd positionCd, E.email email, E.hire_date hireDate, E.retire_date retireDate, E.emp_status empStatus, E.dayoff_cnt dayoffCnt, E.address address, E.emp_phone empPhone, E.reg_dtime regDtime, E.mod_dtime modDtime, E.reg_id regId, E.mod_id modId, S.sign_filename signFilename, P.profile_filename profileFilename FROM emp_base E LEFT JOIN emp_signImg S ON E.id = S.id LEFT JOIN emp_profileImg P ON E.id = P.id
E.id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO emp_profileImg ( id, profile_filename, profile_path, profile_type, reg_dtime, mod_dtime, reg_id, mod_id ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{profileFilename}, #{profilePath}, #{profileType}, NOW(), NOW(), #{id}, #{id} )
mapper.select: SELECT id, profile_filename profileFilename, profile_path profilePath, profile_type profileType, reg_dtime regDtime, mod_dtime modDtime, reg_id regId, mod_id modId FROM emp_profileImg WHERE id=#{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO emp_signImg(id, sign_filename, sign_type, sign_filesize, reg_dtime, mod_dtime, reg_id, mod_id) VALUES(#{id}, #{signFilename}, #{signType}, #{signFilesize}, NOW(), NOW(), #{regId}, #{modId})
mapper.update: UPDATE emp_base SET emp_name = #{empName}, email = #{email}, address = #{address}, emp_phone = #{empPhone} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT emp_name AS empName, id, (SELECT cd_nm FROM st_std_cd WHERE grp_cd="D001" AND cd = dept_cd) AS deptNm, (SELECT cd_nm FROM st_std_cd WHERE grp_cd="T001" AND cd = team_cd) AS teamNm, (SELECT cd_nm FROM st_std_cd WHERE grp_cd="P001" AND cd = position_cd) AS positionNm FROM emp_base WHERE emp_Name LIKE CONCAT("%" , #{empName}, "%")
